casebody.data:
No. 10-5268. Solomon Ben-Tov Cohen, Petitioner v. Steve Hodges, Inspector, United States Postal Service, et al. 562 U.S. 912, 131 S. Ct. 268,

178 L. Ed. 2d 177,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7392. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 369 Fed. Appx. 953.
